sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import Template from '../components/Template' const ReportSumSalePerMonth = () => { const [years, setYears] = useState(() => { let arr = []; let d = new Date(); let currentYear = d.getFullYear() let lastYear = (currentYear - 5); for (let index = lastYear; index < currentYear; index++) return arr.push(index) }) return ( <> ) } export default ReportSumSalePerMonth
